page.description: Properties and methods in the CSS::StyleDef Class.

property.name: text_indent
property.description:
Type: "C",
The text_indent attribute specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block.

property.name: text_align
property.description:
Type: "C",
The text_align attribute specifies the horizontal alignment of text in an element

property.name: text_decoration
property.description:
Type: "C",
The text_decoration attribute specifies the decoration added to text (overline, underline, blink etc).

property.name: text_transform
property.description:
Type: "C",
The text_transform attribute controls the capitalization of text (none,capitalize,upercase,lowercase,inherit).

property.name: text_shadow
property.description:
Type: "C",
The text_shadow attribute controls text shadow (horizontal-size vertical-size [blur] color).

property.name: letter_spacing
property.description:
Type: "C",
he letter_spacing attribute controls the space between characters in a text.

property.name: word_spacing
property.description:
Type: "C",
The word_spacing attribute controls the white space between words.

property.name: white_space
property.description:
Type: "C",
The white_space attribute specifies how white-space inside an element is handled (normal,nowrap,pre,pre-line,pre-wrap,inherit)

property.name: color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Text color for element

property.name: background_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
background color for element

property.name: background_image
property.description:
Type: "C",
background image for element

property.name: background_repeat
property.description:
Type: "C",
repeat background image (i.e. repeat-x)

property.name: background_position
property.description:
Type: "C",
position of background image

property.name: background_attachment
property.description:
Type: "C",
Defines if the background image is fixed, or scrolls with the page (default is scroll).

property.name: background_size
property.description: String background_size property

property.name: font_family
property.description:
Type: "C",
Facename for font

property.name: font_size
property.description:
Type: "C",
Font size in points

property.name: font_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Font style (i.e. italic)

property.name: font_weight
property.description:
Type: "C",
Font weight (i.e. bold)

property.name: font_variant
property.description:
Type: "C",
Specify variant of font, i.e. small-caps.

property.name: border_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Border style for element

property.name: border_width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Width of element border

property.name: border_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Color of border element.

property.name: border_top_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Top border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_top_width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Top border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_top_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Top border color (if different that the default border color)

property.name: border_left_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Left border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_left_width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Left border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_left_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Left border color (if different that default border)

property.name: border_right_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Right border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_right_width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Right border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_right_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Right border color (if different that default border)

property.name: border_bottom_style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Bottom border style (if different that default border)

property.name: border_bottom_width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Bottom border line width (if different that default border width)

property.name: border_bottom_color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Bottom border color (if different that default border)

property.name: padding
property.description:
Type: "C",
Padding on interior of element.

property.name: padding_top
property.description:
Type: "C",
Padding on interior top of element.

property.name: padding_left
property.description:
Type: "C",
Padding on interior left of element.

property.name: padding_right
property.description:
Type: "C",
Padding on interior right of element.

property.name: padding_bottom
property.description:
Type: "C",
Padding on interior bottom of element.

property.name: margin
property.description:
Type: "C",
Margin on exterior of element.

property.name: margin_top
property.description:
Type: "C",
Margin on exterior top of element.

property.name: margin_left
property.description:
Type: "C",
Margin on exterior left of element.

property.name: margin_right
property.description:
Type: "C",
Margin on exterior right of element.

property.name: margin_bottom
property.description:
Type: "C",
Margin on exterior bottom of element.

property.name: display
property.description:
Type: "C",
Define how element should be displayed (i.e. inline,table etc - how object flows)

property.name: visibility
property.description:
Type: "C",
Don't show element, even if it takes space on on the page.

property.name: float
property.description:
Type: "C",
Align an element on the page (i.e. left, right)

property.name: clear
property.description:
Type: "C",
Start new floating elements on specified side (right, left, both).

property.name: overflow
property.description:
Type: "C",
Overflow occurs when element doesn't fit (hidden, scroll, auto).

property.name: vertical_align
property.description:
Type: "C",
The vertical-align property of the element (top/bottom/%)

property.name: cursor
property.description:
Type: "C",
Cursor to display when element is hovered over.

property.name: position
property.description:
Type: "C",
Positioning to use (relative, absolute).

property.name: top
property.description:
Type: "C",
Top position of element.

property.name: left
property.description:
Type: "C",
left posiiton of element.

property.name: right
property.description:
Type: "C",
Right position of element.

property.name: bottom
property.description:
Type: "C",
Bottom position of element.

property.name: width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Width of elemement, does not include padding, borders or margins.

property.name: height
property.description:
Type: "C",
Height of element, does not include padding, borders or margins.

property.name: line_height
property.description:
Type: "C",
Line height specifies the height of each line of text inside an element.

property.name: z_index
property.description:
Type: "C",
Z_index indicates the position back-to-front (greater number is frontmost) in the stack of elements.

property.name: list_style_type
property.description:
Type: "C",
Style of a list (onorded - disc or ordered - decimal are examples of this).

property.name: list_style_image
property.description:
Type: "C",
Optional image to specifify the list marker.

property.name: list_style_position
property.description:
Type: "C",
Position of the list item marker (outside of inside the list elements).

property.name: table_layout
property.description:
Type: "C",
The table layout alogrithm to use - auto = based on content, fixed = specified from table or column element width.

property.name: caption_side
property.description:
Type: "C",
Side captions appear for table (top - default, bottom - caption appears below table).

property.name: border_collapse
property.description:
Type: "C",
Do borders appear collapsed for a table, or detached.

property.name: border_spacing
property.description:
Type: "C",
Space between adjacent borders.

property.name: empty_cells
property.description:
Type: "C",
Set if empty cells should have borders.

property.name: row_span
property.description:
Type: "C",
Element should span specified number of rows.

property.name: col_span
property.description:
Type: "C",
Element should span specified number of columns.

property.name: page_break_before
property.description:
Type: "C",
Control page-break occuring before element (auto,always, avoid).

property.name: page_break_after
property.description:
Type: "C",
Control page-break occuring after element (auto,always, avoid).

property.name: page_break_inside
property.description:
Type: "C",
Control page-break occuring before element (auto, avoid) - this is a keep-together behaviour.

property.name: size
property.description:
Type: "C",
Specify if size of page is absolute or relative.

property.name: marks
property.description:
Type: "C",
CSS property to set crop marks on paged media (crop/cross/none/inherit).

property.name: border_radius
property.description:
Type: "C",
Radius for rounded borders.

property.name: border_top_left_radius
property.description:
Type: "C",
Radius for rounded borders for top left corner only.

property.name: border_top_right_radius
property.description:
Type: "C",
Radius for rounded borders for top right corner only

property.name: border_bottom_left_radius
property.description:
Type: "C",
Radius for rounded borders for bottom left corner only

property.name: border_bottom_right_radius
property.description:
Type: "C",
Radius for rounded borders for bottom right corner only

property.name: box_shadow
property.description:
Type: "C",
Specify drop shadow for box. The CSS3BoxShadow helper can be used to parse/create this.

property.name: box_sizing
property.description:
Type: "C",
Allows override of the way width and heiht are used - content-box is the default behaviour, but border-box has been added to include the border in the box size.

methodref.name: ApplyBoxModifier
methodref.description: Modifies style to conform for a box modifer (section).

methodref.name: CSS3FromLegacy
methodref.description: Set undefined CSS3 features when legacy mozilla Or WebKit attributes.

methodref.name: CSS3StripLegacy
methodref.description: Clear out any legacy mozilla Or WebKit attributes already represented by CSS3 standard attributes in style (unbloat).

methodref.name: CSS3ToLegacy
methodref.description: Represent any CSS3 features as legacy Mozilla and WebKit attributes (bloat).

methodref.name: ClearCss
methodref.description: Clear CSS style sheet.

methodref.name: ConvertToA5BorderStyle
methodref.description: Returns an alpha five border style.

methodref.name: ConvertToA5ColorDef
methodref.description: Returns an alpha anywhere's color definition.

methodref.name: ConvertToTwips
methodref.description: Returns Css units into twips measurement.

methodref.name: FromA5FontDef
methodref.description: Populate font definiton and color from alpha five defitions.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert CSS text to an style definition.

methodref.name: FromStringSCss
methodref.description: Convert SCSS style sheet text to an style definition (handles scss variables etc).

methodref.name: GetDigested
methodref.description: Returns box-shadow attributes that are further digested.

methodref.name: GetField
methodref.description: Get field by name (allows non-standard css fields).

methodref.name: HasBorder
methodref.description: Any aspect of border defined?

methodref.name: HasCSS3
methodref.description: Returns true if style sheet includes CSS3 attributes.

methodref.name: HasFont
methodref.description: Any aspect of font defined?

methodref.name: HasLegacy
methodref.description: Returns true if style sheet includes legacy attributes.

methodref.name: HasRoundedBorder
methodref.description: Defines rounded borders (requires knowledge of corners in stylesheets).

methodref.name: IsSame
methodref.description: Returns true if style matches exactly.

methodref.name: OutputProcess
methodref.description: Process the CSS output (i.e. filter + output combination).

methodref.name: PixelToPoint
methodref.description: Convert any units expressed in device dependent pixels to device indenpendent points.

methodref.name: PointToPixel
methodref.description: Convert any units expressed in device indenpendent points into device dependent pixels.

methodref.name: RemoveField
methodref.description: Remove field by name (allows removal of individual css fields).

methodref.name: SelectorsCombine
methodref.description: Pass in other style definition set undefined attributes, already defined attributes get set to psuedo value <Multiple>.

methodref.name: SetDeclaration
methodref.description: Set field by name (allows non-standard css fields).

methodref.name: ToA5ColorDef
methodref.description: Returns an alpha five font color definition (foreground on background format).

methodref.name: ToA5FontDef
methodref.description: Returns an alpha five font definition.

methodref.name: toString
methodref.description: Output the CSS text that represents the style definition.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
